//instructions using LW and SW- You may have to inserted NOPs to get the required result
00000000 1C010001 // LW $1, 1($0) 
00000001 1C020002 // LW $2, 2($0)
00000002 1C030003 // LW $3, 3($0) 
00000003 1C040004 // LW $4, 4($0)
00000004 04220800 // SUB $1, $1, $2
00000005 00000000 // NOP
00000006 0C641800 // XOR $3, $3, $4 
00000007 00000000 // NOP
00000008 00000000 // NOP
00000009 14232800 // MUL $5, $1, $3 
0000000A 00000000 // NOP
0000000B 00000000 // NOP
0000000C 20050005 // SW $5, 5($0)
